com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.input

Interface IInputEvent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICharInputEvent, ICursorEnterInputEvent, ICursorPosInputEvent, IKeyInputEvent, IMouseButtonInputEvent, IScreenButtonInputEvent, IScreenPointerInputEvent, IScreenPressInputEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseInputEvent, ICharInputEvent.CharInputEvent, ICursorEnterInputEvent.CursorEnterInputEvent, ICursorPosInputEvent.CursorPosInputEvent, IKeyInputEvent.KeyInputEvent, IMouseButtonInputEvent.MouseButtonInputEvent, IScreenButtonInputEvent.ScreenButtonInputEvent, IScreenPointerInputEvent.ScreenPointerInputEvent, IScreenPressInputEvent.ScreenPressInputEvent

    public interface IInputEvent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isHandled()
      Returns whether this event has been marked as handled and has not been reset since then.
      boolean markHandled()
      Marks this event as handled.
      boolean markHandledIf(boolean condition)
      Marks this event as handled, but only if the given condition is true.
      boolean resetHandled()
      Resets this event's handled value to false.

      • isHandled

        boolean isHandled()
        Returns whether this event has been marked as handled and has not been reset since then.
        Returns:
        True if the event is handled, false if not.
